plays.text: Penalty to Henrik Tallinder 2 minutes for Tripping Dave Scatchard
Goal scored by Ales Kotalik assisted by Miroslav Satan and Brian Campbell
Penalty to Jeff Halpern 2 minutes for Crosschecking Vaclav Varada
Penalty to Peter Bondra 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Rory Fitzpatrick 2 minutes for Roughing Ivan Ciernik
Goal scored by Brian Sutherby assisted by Jean-Francois Fortin and Peter Bondra
Penalty to Jean-Francois Fortin 2 minutes for Slashing Curtis Brown
Goal scored by Miroslav Satan assisted by Henrik Tallinder and Curtis Brown
Penalty to Kip Miller 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Peter Bondra unassisted
Goal scored by Jaromir Jagr assisted by Michael Nylander
Goal scored by Dmitri Kalinin assisted by Chris Gratton and J.P. Dumont
Goal scored by Adam Mair assisted by Taylor Pyatt and James Patrick
Penalty to Sergei Gonchar 2 minutes for Roughing Miroslav Satan
